game.name: City Car Stunt 2
game.description:
Take your car to the city and drive it at a balanced speed on the platforms that are in the sky in the second version of the popular car racing games! Would you think that you can challenge these obstacles and wear the crown of the best racer again without download? Join City Car Stunt 2 and be prepared to ride your most loving futuristic super-car and explore the wonderful city like never before! Do not say "No" as it is time to unleash the speed demon within you! 

Grab your car, choose your level, win some races, and get ready to show off the world you are not less than a daredevil! Your ability to drive on dangerous platforms will prove your worth in front of the entire world. Be careful and do not forget to control on your speed and balance otherwise, you will take off the platform and lose in this brand new HTML5 car game! Use Nitro to get more power for the deadly ramps and traps!

Enjoy your favorite 3D car driving simulator in both single and 2 player modes! You will also get a chance to perform some freestyle shows and stunts in the â€œFree Drivingâ€ option. Put your insane driving and focus abilities to finish six different and addictive routes before time expires! Completing each level successfully allows you to unlock a brand new car and enjoy the upcoming levels with more power. There are 7 fabulously designed new vehicles that you can also customize new skins to play through. Not enough? Then try out other free 3D driving games to kill your time during your stay at home or any other location.
